# Background

Previous versions of `r Biocpkg("iSEE")` enabled the use of custom panels via a primitive function passing system.
This system is no longer available.
Instead, we now provide a framework for native integration of user-created panels into the application.
This allows specification of custom interface elements and observers and transmission of multiple selections to other panels.
Prospective panel developers are advised to [read the book](https://kevinrue.github.io/iSEE-book),
as there are too many cool things that will not fit into this vignette.
